meanings.sent1: She ran hyperfunctionally fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: The machine worked hyperfunctionally well after the repair.
meanings.sent3: He hyperfunctionally juggled multiple tasks at once.
meanings.sent4: The clock ticked hyperfunctionally, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The car engine hummed hyperfunctionally, showing no signs of slowing down.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive activity or performance
meanings.sent1: The hyperfunctional athlete broke the record effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperfunctional work ethic impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The hyperfunctional squirrel gathered an abundance of nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: The hyperfunctional computer processed data at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The hyperfunctional team completed the project ahead of schedule.
